text: HELLO, HOW ARE YOU?
Hi, I'm good. Thanks for asking. How are you?
GREAT THANKS.  CAN I ASK IF YOU ARE A CHARITABLE PERSON?
Sometimes, if it is something I feel personally connected to.
HAVE YOU HEARD OF SAVETHECHILDREN?  In the U.S. and around the world, THEY give children a healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn and protection from harm.
I think I have heard of it.
nearly 9 out of 10 dollars going directly to children in need, Save the Children uses your generous donations in the most cost-effective ways possible.
How do you know?
YOU CAN GET ALL THE INFO ATSAVETHECHILDREN.ORG
I don't think I'm interested in sponsoring a child.
nearly 9 out of 10 dollars going directly to children in need, Save the Children uses your generous donations in the most cost-effective ways possible.
You already said that. I'm not sure I believe that they do.
YOU CAN CHECK THE BBB WEBSITE AS WELL.

Well, I'm not meaning to sound rude. I know there are lots of great charities out there that do great things for people. I personally do not feel connected to this organization though. I do not have kids or am interested in children.
YOU CAN GIVE 10 CENTS OF YOUR HIT PAY??
Honestly I could use it myself. How much are you going to donate?
I WILL PROPABLY
How much do you think you will donate?
I WILL DO 25 CENTS
Why not more? Do you not believe in the organization?
CAN YOU DO 10 CENTS?
